title: mixed feelings
review: As far as movie goes its really good, wish i could say the same about this shamefull (true) story. robbed of his victory by damn bureaucrats, so sad.

title: overated
review:
As a... idk, thiller maybe after cuting off 30-40 min. and playing rest on double speed it could be watchable but as horror it fails totally.
How this got note above 7 is beyond me.

title: Suicide

title: i choose pink panther
review: Film is 2h 15m and nothing really happens. How this have almost same score as civil war or ragnarok is beyond me. shame, this panther deserve better.
